content: Join NCARâ€™s ViSR and GeoCAT teams at AGU and AMS for a tutorial titled Visualizing 2D and 3D Geoscience Data in Python. Find out more and how to register in this Pangeo Discourse post
FYI: December 1 is the deadline to register for AGU Learning Workshops

Hi @all ,

You can register directly for the AMS tutorial as we mentioned today during the ESDS Forum.

FYI: The registration for AGU has been closed.
Hi, just want to remind everyone of our upcoming AMS tutorial again before holidays; please share it with colleagues!

Hi all, just another reminder, AMS registration is still open, the deadline is January 26, and the event will take place on January 27, 2024 at 8:30 AM - 12:30 PM Eastern Time (Hybrid) - Baltimore Convention Center
